name: Modern Counter Terror FPS
description:
Anti Terrorist fps mission Strike is a free 3D military action game full of gun shooting missions. Get ready to feel the modern action fps shooting adventure of 2017. Become a best commando soldier from anti terrorist squad who is on mission to win a war against terrorists. Shoot, throw grenades & perform your duty like a best army military hero in this thrilling action packed game. In this game you are an army military soldier commando who loves shooting & is known as the finest army sniper shooter. You are a trained Special Forces agent, your job is to eliminate the suspects by a counter terrorist strike right now. The game is about anti terrorist missions, counter strike on enemies to destroy enemies and kill all terrorist through counter attack with rapid shooting machine guns,by fine sniper shoot hand grenades and other new modern weapons.

Game Features:
- A lot of gun shooting action filled mission
- Plenty of guns to choose from
- Challenging & addictive gameplay
- 3D immersive environment
- Top-notch sound effects
